title: How-To: Using Tag Grouping
description:
Explains how tag fields (starting with #) influence data source partitioning and how
to use tag grouping to limit the number of data sources and improve performance.

examples.name: Group high-cardinality tag into buckets
examples.description: Conceptually, map many tag values into a fixed number of groups to limit data sources.
examples.query: #responsecode -> tag group -> limited number of datasources
